articles.title: National Meeting of Activists in Fruit Farming Field Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Activists in Fruit Farming Field Held
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of activists in fruit farming field took place here on Nov. 28.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK; Choe Hwi and Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK; Ko In Ho, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture; Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the C.C., Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea; officials concerned and officials, innovators, scientists and technicians in the fruit farming field.
					
					 "Let Us Effect a Fresh Turn in Developing Fruit Farming", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the meeting, was conveyed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the letter indicated the main task facing the fruit farming field at present and the orientation and ways for putting the fruit farming on a new scientific base and radically increasing the fruit production.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and workers in the fruit farming field would implement the Party's policy on fruit farming to the letter and thus effect a fresh turn in developing the fruit farming.
					
					 Ko In Ho made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the proud history of fruit farming development is a sacred history recorded with boundless love and devotion of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the people.
					
					 The fruit farming in the DPRK has now made a fresh development under the wise guidance of the respected Supreme Leader, he said, referring to the achievements made in the field of fruit farming in recent years through a dynamic drive to carry through the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Party's policy.
					
					 The reporter called upon the officials and working people in the fruit farming field to intensify the movement for scientific fruit farming kindled by the Party and thus bring about a drastic turn in the development of the country's fruit farming.
					
					 At the meeting speakers expressed their resolve to fulfill their mission and duty, after mentioning the successes and experience gained in the efforts to solidify the material and technological foundations for fruit farming and carry out their fruit production plan.
					
					 Then the standing of the socialist production emulation among the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm, Kwail County and Pukchong County for Juche 106 (2017) was announced. The rotating silk banner and citation in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the DPRK Cabinet were awarded to Kwail County which took the first place and prizes went to the successful units.
					
					 The outline for the socialist production emulation in the field of fruit farming for Juche 107 (2018) was announced.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Military Attache
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Military Attache
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Marcelino Rodriguez Gonzalez, military attache of the Cuban embassy here, gave a reception Friday to mark the 61st Day of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba.
					 Present on invitation were Army Col. General Kim Hyong Ryong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and representatives and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Ambassador Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo and officials of the Cuban embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Osandok Prize Sports Contest opened with due ceremony at the Ice Rink here on Friday to mark the 100th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Its participants will compete in such events as football, ice hockey, speed skating, figure skating and short track speed skating in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Samjiyon and other places.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned, sportspersons and working people.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a men's ice hockey match between the Taesongsan Sports Team and the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team.

articles.title: Nation's Famous Art Groups Give Premiere in Sariwon
articles.content:
Nation's Famous Art Groups Give Premiere in Sariwon
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave their premiere at the North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre on Thursday.
					 Among the audience were officials and working people of all strata from major industrial establishments and co-op farms in the province and youth and students.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female solo "Opening My Heart", male trio and male chorus "Along One Road of Socialism" and dance "Dash toward Future".
					
					 The audience gave a thunderous applause when the image of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was projected on the stage background.
					
					 Narrative poem "Transmit to posterity, the land of North Hwanghae Province!" deeply touched the hearts of the audience as it represented the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great men who made a new history of radical changes in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The performance evoked lively response among the audience.
					
					 It goes on.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A joint delegation of political parties of the State Duma of Russia headed by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is head of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Korean Painting with Long History
articles.content:
Korean Painting with Long History
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean painting is one of national heritages boasting of long history of development. It can be well evidenced by tomb murals of Koguryo (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) and pictures of Dam Jing and Sol Ko, famous artists of Koguryo and Silla.
					 The Korean painting was further developed in the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), clearly showing the characters peculiar to it.
					
					 But at that time, landscapes in ink came to form the main current of the Korean painting due to literary-style painters who had inclined to landscape, depreciating the figure painting.
					
					 The historic limitations of the Korean painting could be overcome and the Korean painting step into the phase of fresh development, thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had wisely led the work to overcome the tendencies of national nihilism and restorationism, which intend to despise the Korean painting or revive its shortcomings, and to develop the Korean painting as required by the sentiment and emotion of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that top priority should be attached to the Korean painting ahead of other forms of fine arts to establish Juche in the field of the fine arts and thus successfully create the socialist national fine arts.
					
					 Now the Korean painting is being developed into the main form of the socialist national fine arts.

articles.title: Japan's Crime Witnessed by Obliteration of Korean Flag
articles.content:
Japan's Crime Witnessed by Obliteration of Korean Flag
Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists inflicted innumerable pain and misfortune upon the Korean people after reducing Korea into its colony. After fabricating the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" in November 1905, Japan instituted the "flag of Residency-general" in a bid to obliterate the Korean flag.
					In this regard, Prof. and Dr. Kong Myong Song, director of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					The institution of the "flag of Residency-general" was not merely for improving the image of "Resident-general in Korea", but for showing that Korea was a complete colony of Japan.
					
					The Japanese imperialists brought out the world maps with Korea blue-colored under the Japan flag to indicate that Korea was their colony.
					
					They also hoisted the "flag of Residency-general" at the "Residency-General" and printed it on vehicles, ships and others to ridicule the sovereign rights of Korea and trample down the national pride and self-confidence of the Korean people.
					
					After August 1910, the Japanese imperialists openly hoisted the Japanese flag in front of the entrance of the main building of Kyongbok Palace.
					
					During their colonial rule over Korea, the Japanese imperialists were desperately keen on totally obliterating the national consciousness of the Korean people by forcing them to "pay respect" to the Japanese flag.
					
					But the Korean people had never acknowledged the Japanese flag as their national flag, which was well evidenced by the incident of obliterating the flag of the Rising Sun, the Japanese flag, in 1930.
					
					110 years has passed from when the Japanese imperialists occupied Korea by force of arms, but the Korean people always remember the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation and will force them to pay dearly for their past crimes without fail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Trying to Revive Conservative Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities for Trying to Revive Conservative Policy
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Days ago, when he set out on a trip to Southeast Asian countries, the chief executive of south Korea gave his close associates the order to "continuously push ahead with the globalization of new village movement", a policy of the former regime.
					 This is a compromise with conservatism and submission to it and intolerable mockery of the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary.
					
					 Noting that the south Korean puppet ruling quarters' purpose of resorting to the "globalization of the new village movement" is to draw the conservative circle smelling of the "scent of Park Chung Hee" to creating the ruling foundation, the commentary goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities are going to tempt developing countries in Asia and Africa under the signboard of "globalization of the new village movement" and boost the international cooperation to pressurize the DPRK.
					
					 Their attempt to draw other countries with the outdated policy on the rubbish heap of history as bait for cooperation in pressurizing the DPRK is an unpardonable crime.
					
					 The south Korean people will not remain an onlooker to the reckless behavior of the authorities styling themselves as "a candlelight regime" who are trying to revive such typical evils of conservatism as "globalization of new village movement", instead of combating them.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Representatives of organizations in south Korea set up an institute for the withdrawal of U.S. military base in Phyongthaek in Kyonggi Province on November 28, according to Minjok Ilbo, a south Korean internet newspaper. 
					 They said that south Korean society has been put under the control of the U.S. and the south Koreans are not granted the right to stand on their land.
					
					 The U.S. forces will no longer be given any place to set their feet if the south Koreans from all walks of life realize that the U.S. forces are bloodsuckers who violate the rights of the south Koreans, they added.
					
					 They underscored the need to bring the people to the knowledge of the necessity of the withdrawal of the U.S. military base and thus make them turn out in protest against the U.S. forces.
					
					 They recalled Trump's rhetoric about destroying a country at UN General Assembly, branding him as dictator and imperialist hooligan.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean nation should hold a gathering for great national unity, replace the armistice agreement by a peace accord, get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea and thus build a society where the spirit of By our nation itself is embodied.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Slovenian Committee for Remembering HE Kim Jong Il posted on a website leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on Nov. 25 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of his demise, the 26th anniversary of his assumption of the Supreme Commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA Supreme Commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly reflecting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nakhodka of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Nakhodka of Russia
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A Nakhodka City, Russia, committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 22.
					 Chernih, secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life and exploits in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan committee for remembering HE Kim Jong Il on the 6th anniversary of his demise was formed in Colombo on Nov. 21.
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Germany
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the German Communist Party on Nov. 24.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 24 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and a seminar to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Algeria
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the General Youth Union of Algeria  on Nov. 22.
					 The chairperson of the union was elected chairperson of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 22 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Efectuada la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola en la RPDC
articles.content:
Efectuada la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola en la RPDC
Pyongyang, primero de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el 28 de noviembre en esta capital la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola.
					Asistieron al conclave Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Hwi y Pak Thae Dok, vicepresidentes del CC del PTC, Ko In Ho, vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Kim Chang Yop, presidente del CC de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, funcionarios, innovadores, cientificos y tecnicos de los dominios interesados y de la rama fruticola.
					
					Fue transmitido el mensaje del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un enviado a los participantes en la reunion nacional de activistas de la rama fruticola: "Logremos avances trascendentales en la fruticultura".
					
					En su mensaje el Maximo Dirigente dilucido el problema principal, el rumbo y los remedios para incrementar decididamente la produccion fruticola llevandola a la nueva base cientifica.
					
					Y expreso esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y otros trabajadores del dominio fruticola materializaran estrictamente la politica del partido en materia de la fruticultura y asi lograran avances trascendentales en esta rama
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Ko In Ho.
					
					El informante dijo que la orgullosa historia del desarrollo  de la fruticultura esta registrada con el infinito amor y contribucion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il hacia el pueblo.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion del Maximo Dirigente la fruticultura de Corea entra hoy dia en el camino del nuevo desarrollo.
					
					Se refirio a los exitos logrados en los ultimos anos por el sector fruticola en el proceso de materializar cabalmente los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la politica del partido.
					
					Llamo a los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama a sostener mas firmemente la orientacion del partido de desarrollar de manera cientifica la fruticultura y registrar asi un viraje fundamental en su desarrollo.
					
					Los oradores hablaron de los exitos y las experiencias alcanzados en los trabajos pasados por consolidar mas la base material y tecnica de la rama fruticola y cumplir el plan de produccion y expusieron la decision de materializar su mision y deber.
					
					En la reunion fue publicado el orden de emulacion productiva para el 106 (2017) de la Era Juche entre la Granja Combinada Fruticola Taedonggang, la Granja Combinada Fruticola de Kosan, el distrito de Kwail y el de Pukchong, y se otorgaron al distrito de Kwail que ocupo el primer lugar el banderin circulatorio comun y el diploma del CC del PTC y del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Ademas, hubo premiacion a otras unidades sobresalientes.
					
					Acto seguido, fue publicado el programa de emulacion productiva del sector fruticola para el 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
